verses.verse: <WG816> And Having Looked Intently <WG1161> <WG3588> Paul <WG3972> On The <WG3588> Sanhedrim <WG4892> Said, <WG2036> Men <WG435> Brethren, <WG80> I 1473 P-1NS In All 3956 A-DSF Conscience 4893 N-DSF Good 18 A-DSF Have Conducted Myself 4176 V-RPI-1S Towards 3588 T-DSM God 2316 N-DSM Unto 891 PREP This 3778 D-GSF 3588 T-GSF Day. 2250 N-GSF

<WG1097> But Having Known <WG1161> <WG3588> Paul <WG3972> That <WG3754> The <WG3588> One <WG1520> Part <WG3313> Consists <WG2076> Of Sadducees <WG4523> And <WG3588> The <WG1161> Other <WG2087> Of Pharisees <WG5330> Cried Out <WG2896> In <WG1722> The <WG3588> Sanhedrim, <WG4892> Men <WG435> Brethren, <WG80> I 1473 P-1NS A Pharisee 5330 N-NSM Am, 1510 V-PXI-1S Son 5207 N-NSM Of A Pharisee : 5330 N-GSM Concerning 4012 PREP A Hope 1680 N-GSF And 2532 CONJ Resurrection 386 N-GSF Of The Dead 3498 A-GPM I 1473 P-1NS Am Judged. 2919 V-PPI-1S

And <WG5124> This <WG1161> He <WG846> , Having Spoken <WG2980> There Was <WG1096> A Dissension <WG4714> Of The <WG3588> Pharisees <WG5330> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Sadducees, <WG4523> And <WG2532> Was Divided <WG4977> The <WG3588> Multitude. <WG4128>

Sadducees <WG4523> Indeed <WG3303> For <WG1063> Say <WG3004> There <WG3361> Is No <WG1511> Resurrection <WG386> Nor <WG3366> Angel <WG32> Nor <WG3383> Spirit; <WG4151> <WG5330> But Pharisees <WG1161> Confess <WG3670> <WG3588> Both. <WG297>

<WG1096> And There Was <WG1161> A Clamour <WG2906> Great, <WG3173> And <WG2532> Having Risen Up <WG450> The <WG3588> Scribes <WG1122> Of The <WG3588> Part <WG3313> Of The <WG3588> Pharisees <WG5330> They Were Contending, <WG1264> Saying, <WG3004> Nothing <WG3762> Evil <WG2556> We Find <WG2147> In <WG1722> <WG3588> This <WG444> Man; <WG5129> If <WG1487> And <WG1161> A Spirit <WG4151> Spoke <WG2980> To Him <WG846> Or <WG2228> An Angel, <WG32> Let Us <WG3361> Not Fight Against God. <WG2313>

<WG4183> And A Great <WG1161> Arising <WG1096> Dissention, <WG4714> Fearing <WG2125> The <WG3588> Chief Captain <WG5506> Lest <WG3361> Should Be Torn In Pieces <WG1288> <WG3588> Paul <WG3972> ' By <WG5259> Them, <WG846> Commanded <WG2753> The <WG3588> Troop <WG4753> Having Gone Down <WG2597> To Take By Force <WG726> Him <WG846> From <WG1537> Midst <WG3319> Their, <WG846> <WG71> And To Bring Him <WG5037> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Fortress. <WG3925>

But <WG3588> The <WG1161> Following <WG1966> Night <WG3571> Standing By <WG2186> Him <WG846> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> Said, <WG2036> Be Of Good Courage, <WG2293> Paul; <WG3972> As <WG5613> For <WG1063> Thou Didst Fully Testify <WG1263> The Things <WG3588> Concerning <WG4012> Me <WG1700> At <WG1519> Jerusalem, <WG2419> So <WG3779> Thou <WG4571> Must <WG1163> Also <WG2532> At <WG1519> Rome <WG4516> Bear Witness. <WG3140>

<WG1096> And It Being <WG1161> Day, <WG2250> Having Made <WG4160> Some <WG5100> Of The <WG3588> Jews <WG2453> A Combination <WG4963> Put Under A Curse <WG332> Themselves, <WG1438> Declaring <WG3004> Neither <WG3383> To Eat <WG5315> Nor <WG3383> To Drink <WG4095> <WG2193> Till <WG3739> They Should Kill <WG615> <WG3588> Paul. <WG3972>
<WG2258> And They Were <WG1161> More Than <WG4119> Forty <WG5062> Who <WG3588> This <WG3778> <WG3588> Conspiracy <WG4945> , Had Made; <WG4160>

Who <WG3748> Having Come <WG4334> To The <WG3588> Chief Priests <WG749> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Elders <WG4245> , Said, <WG2036> With A Curse <WG331> Who Have Cursed <WG332> Ourselves, <WG1438> Nothing <WG3367> To Taste <WG1089> <WG2193> Until <WG3739> We Should Kill <WG615> <WG3588> Paul. <WG3972>

Now <WG3568> Therefore <WG3767> Ye <WG5210> Make A Representation <WG1718> To The <WG3588> Chief Captain <WG5506> With <WG4862> The <WG3588> Sanhedrim, <WG4892> So That <WG3704> Tomorrow <WG839> Him <WG846> He May Bring Down <WG2609> To <WG4314> You, <WG5209> As <WG5613> Being About <WG3195> To Examine <WG1231> More Accurately <WG199> The Things <WG3588> Concerning <WG4012> Him, <WG846> And <WG2249> We, <WG1161> Before <WG4253> <WG3588> Drawing Near <WG1448> His <WG846> Ready <WG2092> Are <WG2070> <WG3588> To Put To Death <WG337> Him. <WG846>

<WG191> But Having Heard Of <WG1161> The <WG3588> Son <WG5207> Of The <WG3588> Sister <WG79> Of Paul <WG3972> The <WG3588> Lying In Wait, <WG1749> Having Come Near <WG3854> And <WG2532> Entered <WG1525> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Fortress <WG3925> He Reported It <WG518> <WG3588> To Paul. <WG3972>

<WG4341> And Having Called To Him <WG1161> <WG3588> Paul <WG3972> One <WG1520> Of The <WG3588> Centurions, <WG1543> Said, <WG5346> This <WG3588> Young <WG3494> Man <WG5126> Take <WG520> To <WG4314> The <WG3588> Chief Captain, <WG5506> He Has <WG2192> For <WG1063> Something <WG5100> To Report <WG518> To Him. <WG846>

<WG1949> And Having Taken Hold <WG1161> Of <WG3588> Hand <WG5495> His <WG846> The <WG3588> Chief Captain, <WG5506> And <WG2532> Having Withdrawn <WG402> ' <WG2596> Apart <WG2398> Inquired, <WG4441> What <WG5101> It Is <WG2076> Which <WG3739> Thou Hast <WG2192> To Report <WG518> To Me? <WG3427>

<WG2036> <WG1161> And He Said, <WG3754> The <WG3588> Jews <WG2453> Agreed <WG4934> <WG3588> To Request <WG2065> Thee, <WG4571> That <WG3704> Tomorrow <WG839> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Sanhedrim <WG4892> Thou Mayest Bring Down <WG2609> <WG3588> Paul, <WG3972> As <WG5613> Being About <WG3195> Something <WG5100> More Accurately <WG199> To Inquire <WG4441> Concerning <WG4012> Him. <WG846>

Thou <WG4771> Therefore <WG3767> Be Not <WG3361> Persuaded <WG3982> By Them, <WG846> Lie In Wait For <WG1748> For <WG1063> Him <WG846> Of <WG1537> Them <WG846> Men <WG435> More Than <WG4119> Forty <WG5062> Who <WG3748> Put Under A Curse <WG332> Themselves <WG1438> Neither <WG3383> To Eat <WG5315> Nor <WG3383> To Drink <WG4095> <WG2193> Till <WG3739> They Put To Death <WG337> Him; <WG846> And <WG2532> Now <WG3568> Ready <WG2092> They Are <WG1526> Waiting <WG4327> The <WG3588> From <WG575> Thee <WG4675> Promise. <WG1860>

<WG3588> The <WG3303> Therefore <WG3767> Chief Captain <WG5506> Dismissed <WG630> The <WG3588> , Young Man, <WG3494> Having Charged Him <WG3853> To No One <WG3367> To Utter <WG1583> That <WG3754> These Things <WG5023> Thou Didst Represent <WG1718> To <WG4314> Me. <WG3165>

<WG2934> And Beasts <WG5037> To Have Provided, <WG3936> That <WG2443> Having Set On <WG1913> <WG3588> Paul <WG3972> They May Carry Him Safe Through <WG1295> To <WG4314> Felix <WG5344> The <WG3588> Governor, <WG2232>

Claudius <WG2804> Lysias <WG3079> To The <WG3588> Most Excellent <WG2903> Governor, <WG2232> Felix, <WG5344> Greeting. <WG5463>

<WG3588> This <WG435> Man, <WG5126> Having Been Seized <WG4815> By <WG5259> The <WG3588> Jews, <WG2453> And <WG2532> Being About <WG3195> To Put To Death <WG337> ' By <WG5259> Them, <WG846> Having Come Up <WG2186> With <WG4862> The <WG3588> Troop <WG4753> I Rescued <WG1807> , Him, <WG846> Having Heard <WG3129> That <WG3754> A Roman <WG4514> He Is. <WG2076>

<WG1014> And Desiring <WG1161> To Know <WG1097> The <WG3588> Charge <WG156> ' On Account Of <WG1223> Which <WG3739> They Accused <WG1458> Him <WG846> I Brought Down <WG2609> Him <WG846> To <WG1519> <WG3588> Sanhedrim : <WG4892> Their <WG846>

<WG3588> The <WG3303> Therefore <WG3767> Soldiers, <WG4757> According To <WG2596> The <WG3588> Orders Given <WG1299> To Them, <WG846> Having Taken <WG353> <WG3588> Paul <WG3972> Brought Him <WG71> By <WG1223> <WG3588> Night <WG3571> To <WG1519> <WG3588> Antipatris, <WG494>
